# Max Uint32

> Maximum unsigned 32-bit integer.

<section class="usage">

## Usage

```javascript
var UINT32_MAX = require( '@stdlib/constants/math/uint32-max' );
```

#### UINT32_MAX

Maximum unsigned 32-bit `integer`. 

```javascript
var bool = ( UINT32_MAX === 4294967295 );
// returns true
```

</section>

<!-- /.usage -->

<section class="notes">

## Notes

-   `UINT32_MAX` is the maximum `array` length.

</section>

<!-- /.notes -->

## Examples

<!-- eslint no-undef: "error" -->

```javascript
var UINT32_MAX = require( '@stdlib/constants/math/uint32-max' );

console.log( UINT32_MAX );
// => 4294967295
```
